New Records: Cleveland Cavaliers became the fourth team in NBA history to start a season 15-0.
Key Match Events: Evan Mobley recorded 23 points and 11 rebounds.
Jarrett Allen added 21 points and 15 rebounds.
Cleveland Cavaliers shot 57.1% from the field.
Cleveland Cavaliers held a 72-59 halftime lead with 66.7% shooting from the field.
